title: Online Lecture Design Checklist Utilization Course for Digital Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer application skills and general understanding of scientific fields
context.additional_context: Enhancing the capability to design online lectures that systematically deliver science theories and applications in VR simulation environments for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose basic quality standards for VR-based science education modules using an online lecture design checklist.
Learners can apply checklist items step-by-step to construct effective content in a simulation environment
Learners can evaluate the overall quality of a designed online course using assessment tools and derive improvement suggestions
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
